1598587200.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1598587200.descr: Take a look at all the latest news in business, finance and where the markets are headed in this show that focuses on macro issues with a Middle Eastern context. The programme is broadcast from Dubai and hosted by Yousef Gamal El-Din and Manus Cranny.

1598590800.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
1598590800.descr: Don't miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

1598594400.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
1598594400.descr: Take a look at the European markets at the beginning of the trading day and find out the most important global business and markets news and information. The programme is hosted by Anna Edwards, live from London with the help from Matt Miller in Berlin.

1598601600.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1598601600.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1598605200.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1598605200.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1598616000.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1598616000.descr: Don't miss the latest news in finance, economics and investment and most important business stories, while you take a look at the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics.

1598619600.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
1598619600.descr: Join host Jonathan Ferro as he highlights all the important news you need to know heading into the Opening Bell on Wall Street in New York City. He will show viewers all the latest charts in order to help them understand what to expect every trading day.

1598623200.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1598623200.descr: Find out all the latest and most important markets news and business trends from Western hemisphere. The programme is hosted by Vonnie Quinn, with the help from various other hosts, and it airs live from New York City.

1598626800.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
1598626800.descr: Take a look at the European markets at the end of each trading day and hear all the news and the major market moving stories from Europe. Show is hosted by Vonnie Quinn in New York, with the help from Guy Johnson in London.

1598630400.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1598630400.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1598634000.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1598634000.descr: Find out all the latest and most important markets news and business trends from Western hemisphere. The programme is hosted by Vonnie Quinn, with the help from various other hosts, and it airs live from New York City.

1598637600.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1598637600.descr: Hosted by Scarlet Fu and Romaine Bostick, Bloomberg Markets: The Close brings you the latest market developments from the financial world. With experts providing detailed analysis the team cover the market's events right up to the closing seconds of trading. Featuring insight from investors and traders the show provides valuable information to anyone with an interest in the finance world.

1598644800.title: What'd You Miss?
1598644800.descr: Take a look at all the latest news and analysis after the closing bell on Wall Street and other markets around the world. Join Caroline Hyde, Romaine Bostick, Taylor Riggs and some other hosts as they bring you a unique perspective on the week's top stories, so you don't miss a thing!

1598648400.title: Bloomberg Technology
1598648400.descr: Hosted by Emily Chang from San Francisco, California, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

1598652000.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
1598652000.descr: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry.

1598655600.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1598655600.descr: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

1598657400.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1598657400.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen. From face-to-face interviews to detailed breakdowns of the mechanisms both behind and in operation, the programme explores the currents shaping the ever changing world we live in.

1598659200.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1598659200.descr: Take a look at all the latest news in business, finance and where the markets are headed in this show that focuses on macro issues with a Middle Eastern context. The programme is broadcast from Dubai and hosted by Yousef Gamal El-Din and Manus Cranny.

1598662800.title: Art+Technology
1598662800.descr: Captivating documentary series that follows various talented artists from around the world that make art with the help from technology. Technology is changing the way we make, experience and share our ideas, and viewers will have a chance to see how some artist use it to make incredible art, thus creating a completely new genre.

1598664600.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1598664600.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen.
